Author: Decker#3767
Content:
@Deleted User btw, just for your knowledge ... you don't need to wait to resync all chain and wait all txes to be in wallet just for get some "forgotten coins". if you using resetted wallet and need to access some forgotten funds before reset - you can follow two ways:

1. use explorer API to get unspent outputs and construct spending tx manually.
2. just parse LevelDB database to get your utxos and construct tx from this data.

i have a plan to write a separate app or script which will help to do this automatically.

Author: Decker#3767
Content: bcz rescan wallet from scratch after a year of notarisation is very looooooong process.

Author: Decker#3767
Content: and more than 1 Gb wallet.dat for kmd is slooooow anyway.

Author: Strob#3417
Content: Does anyone have any idea why d0ct0r has no BEER and I have no TXSCLCC? I tried everything I could think of. My loss of TXSCLCC was triggered by some downtime around 5 days ago. then I tried many things: reindexing, zapping wallet, reseting wallet, cleanning wallet, rebooting many times, deleting everything in myTXSCLCC forlder and reconstructing it. And since 3 days and a half I have been doing nothing just to see if the stochastic Iguana process will just randomly choose me again one day. All without success. I could just wipe my hard drive and rebuild my node from scratch but I would like to know what's the bug... 🤔
